participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.

participant_2.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

content.text: S.H.I.E.L.D. academy, top of your class, two PHDs in very advanced fields.
The I.M.T., the international monkey... interschool multidiscipline tournament.
do you work there or own it?
Well, FYI, I am also an engineer with a degree from Berkeley who's not only created my share of code,  but given birth to two real humans.  Oh, God.
Oh. Which I think you will excel at.
